course.title: ADM 4317 Leadership, Strategy and Sustainability (3 units)
course.desc: Corporate social responsibility (CSR) and sustainability at multiple levels – self, others, the organization and society. Personal values, ethics, beliefs and attitudes and their relation to CSR and sustainability. Emphasis upon action, with the opportunity for leadership development. Social entrepreneurship, B-Corps, carbon-negative enterprises, regenerative business models, cradle-to-cradle design thinking, the circular economy.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM courses at the 4000 level are reserved for B.Com. students who have completed at least 33 units from ADM core courses, including ADM 2381.
